metadata.synopsis: Voicebark played by Wyll when party enters area under the Wyrm's Rock bridgeIMPORTANT: The answer node may not play in case there are no fitting players to answer Wyll, so it should still make sense even without an answer.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Enter area under the Wyrm's Rock bridge 51, 34, 154

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: I'll be - my old fishing spot. Spent more than a few Summertide days here.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: And did young Wyll ever catch anything?

1.speaker: Wyll
1.text: Only a few head colds - and a tongue-lashing from my worried father.
